attributes.action: Restore the World war two guns on top of the rock of Gibraltar
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These vital parts of Gib's and the british history are just rusting away on the top of the rock and not many people even get to see them anymore because it is dangerous to go up there. I propose that the government invest money to restore the guns and make sure no-one forgets what has happened there in the past :)
